about_the_game:
Endless Salvation：

This is a puzzle-solving game that includes both co-op storylines for two players and single-player storylines. 

In the two-player co-op mode, you need to find a partner, and both of you must purchase a copy of the game in order to play.

You don't need to be connected to the internet with your companions! You only need to be able to communicate, face-to-face, video, or phone communication.

Demo contents Single-player mode

You will play the role of the Savior, solving puzzles in 3 scenes and 12 frames.

The single-player mode is the prequel to the co-op mode, so it is recommended to prioritize completing the single-player mode.

The game features side-scrolling movement, and all you need to do is click on the scene to obtain clues, interact with characters, and solve puzzles.

content_descriptors.notes: 场景中存在关于阴间的想象卡通描写，同时有骷髅、鬼魂的卡通图案描述。The scene contains imaginative cartoon depictions of the underworld, along with cartoon illustrations of skeletons and ghosts.

short_description: Endless Salvation is a cooperative puzzle game (with a single-player prelude) .You and your partner will respectively play the roles of Savior, who’s rescuing the Wanderer, and Wanderer, who seeks a way to come back to mundane world. Communicate effectively and complete the adventure together.
